name: Teeny Tailor
description:
Cinderella needs the help of the best little tailors in the land to prepare for her night at the ball! Make her a wonderful outfit while fending off the attacks of her stepmother's evil cat!

Created for the 41st Ludum Dare game jam. The theme is "two incompatible genres!" We created a turn-based dressing game.

Credits:

Programming: Chelsea Whitmore, www.chelsea-whitmore.com

Characters Art: Noah Hayes, https://www.noaholiverhayes.com/

UI Design and Background Art: Paige Silva, https://paigesilva.art/

Music is "The Snow Queen" by Kevin MacLeod.
